trans-unit.source: The topics in this section provides describes and provides guidance about handling errors related to OAuth 2.0 from Azure AD authorization, Azure AD token issuance endpoints, errors returned by resources, such as web APIs.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section provides describes and provides guidance about handling errors related to OAuth 2.0 from Azure AD authorization, Azure AD token issuance endpoints, errors returned by resources, such as web APIs.

trans-unit.source: This section has the following topics:
trans-unit.target: This section has the following topics:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="aaa1d6d2-4cd0-4ac4-a6ce-1555efb4cd34" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authorization Endpoint Errors</link>: Describes the errors that the Azure AD authorization endpoint returns and explains how to handle them.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="aaa1d6d2-4cd0-4ac4-a6ce-1555efb4cd34" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authorization Endpoint Errors</link>: Describes the errors that the Azure AD authorization endpoint returns and explains how to handle them.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="f9a1b1ca-b662-4c6c-9b95-ab74e5a1717b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Token Issuance Endpoint Errors</link>: Describes the errors that the Azure AD token issuance endpoint returns and explains how to handle them.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="f9a1b1ca-b662-4c6c-9b95-ab74e5a1717b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Token Issuance Endpoint Errors</link>: Describes the errors that the Azure AD token issuance endpoint returns and explains how to handle them.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="396984eb-1827-43ad-9a41-53246346cd92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Errors from Secured Resources</link>: Describes errors that might be returned by a resource that is secured in Azure AD, such as a web API.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="396984eb-1827-43ad-9a41-53246346cd92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Errors from Secured Resources</link>: Describes errors that might be returned by a resource that is secured in Azure AD, such as a web API.
